save(OutputStream) - Method in class com.ezrebclan.asset.core.Asset
 
save(OutputStream) - Method in interface com.ezrebclan.asset.core.Saveable
Saves a Saveable object to an OutputStream
Saveable - Interface in com.ezrebclan.asset.core
A Saveable class can be "saved" (whatever that may mean is up to the class) using the Saveable.save(OutputStream) method.

SmallTextAsset - Class in com.ezrebclan.asset.assetTypes
A Small Text Asset is a single line of text.
If you need to store multiple lines of text, look into a Big Text Asset.
SmallTextAsset(InputStream) - Constructor for class com.ezrebclan.asset.assetTypes.SmallTextAsset
Loads a SmallTextAsset from an InputStream
SmallTextAsset(String, String) - Constructor for class com.ezrebclan.asset.assetTypes.SmallTextAsset
Creates a SmallTextAsset, assigns it a name, and sets the line of text.
